name: business solution
body:
this project will prove itself as a great solution to the problem of chained organizations.this software will able to provide a simple solutions to the complex problem of the organization 
 
It will help organization to maintain all the record at a single place connected through internet.It help them to organize all the sale records and provide user a profit out of their whole business and it will be having some capability of data mining which will tell the user which of their items are most popular and it will help them to  enhance their business.


Project Goals and Objective
       One of the main objective is to help organizations to handle their chain business with a single tool.It will help the organization to maintain  all the record.
      To make it a good networking tool which help them connect to their customers and employs at a single platform.
And in future I will upgrade it to receive the orders through it via internet.
